只读状态适用于单纯的数据展示场景。.en-us: Readonly status is suitable for displaying data only.

限制必须有选中值.en-us: Limit the number of selected values

设置`allowNoValue=False`后，将会阻止用户对唯一选中值的取消选.en-us: Set `allowNoValue=False` to prevent the user from canceling the selection of the unique selected value.

通过回调监听已选中卡片对应值。.en-us: Listen to the corresponding value of the selected card through the callback listener.
